mainText:
What can be said about Steve Jobs that his actions have not? He built a great company and pioneered the personal computer. After being fired he returned
 to his company, only to make it the most valuable in the world. As I send this message from my iPhone, I am saddened. He was the last of a dying breed,
 a great entrepreneur. His work has impacted nearly every person on the planet in one way or another. The world has lost a great inventor, spokesperson,
 businessman, genius, human, and American. What Steve left behind can not be
 put into words.
author: Patrick
